title: How is Mark Zuckerberg Convincing DeepMind AI Researchers to Join Meta?
description: Mark Zuckerberg, the CEO of Meta, formerly Facebook, is leaving no stone unturned in his quest to bolster the company’s AI prowess. In a recent development reported by The Information, Zuckerberg has personally reached out to AI researchers at Google’s DeepMind, leveraging personal emails to entice them into joining Meta’s ranks. This aggressive recruitment tactic, […]

title: European investors can still hop on the spot Bitcoin ETF wagon
description: For those of you in Europe eyeing the Bitcoin bonanza, rubbing your hands with glee at the thought of getting in on the action, here’s the deal:- Turns out you’re not late to the party. Not even by a long shot. This year, the U.S. approved the very first spot Bitcoin ETFs. That’s right. The […]

title: SEC and Terraform Labs’ Trial Begins; Do Kwon Not Present
description:
The civil fraud trial involving Terraform Labs’ Founder Do Kwon, reportedly began on Monday in Manhattan court. Media journalist Zack Guzman shared a series of X posts, providing more insights into the legal development. The case had its beginnings back in 2022 when Terraform Labs crashed, following which Kwon was arrested in Montenegro for fraud. […]

The post SEC and Terraform Labs’ Trial Begins; Do Kwon Not Present appeared first on Coin Edition.
